channel.title: Chennai on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Chennai on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 20 Feb 2022 00:00
item.description: These fishermen in their catamarans were slowly yet gleefully making their way back to the coastline early AM. Likely a terrific catch that they could sell back on land? Or was it just another day in the waters making ends meet, doing what they love and loving what they do?
item.content:encoded: These fishermen in their catamarans were slowly yet gleefully making their way back to the coastline early AM. Likely a terrific catch that they could sell back on land? Or was it just another day in the waters making ends meet, doing what they love and loving what they do?

item.title: 20 Sep 2019 00:00
item.description:
A wonderful morning run on the Marina today. Barefoot as always!

With a ‘gloomy’ weather and not many visitors this early morning, we had most of the beach all for ourselves! As S and I were just about turning around after reaching Ice House, the slight drizzle very soon turned into a full fledged rain. Pouring rain, early morning waves and an empty beach is something I could take in every single day! Shasta seemed to have a terrific time too.

Meena happened to click this picture of us running from the distance. So glad she got around capturing this moment!
